Name: ZombieVan Drive
About the game: ZombieVan Drive is an arcade survival game in which you have to drive ZombieVan to exterminate zombies on the road. There is a lot of debris on the road that you need to avoid to avoid damaging the ZombieVan, but you can also find fuel and repairs so you can keep driving for as long as possible. Since ZombieVan exists to exterminate zombies on the roads, this is what you should do, gaining as many points as possible for downed zombies.
